data.comment: Today's referee, Hakim Ben el Hadj, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 2, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Dijon's area.
Throw-in Dijon.
Can Dijon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 4, Bersant Celina (Dijon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Dijon push forward at Stade Gaston Gerard and Moussa Konate gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Lille defence.
In the minute 5, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille.
Lille drives forward and Yusuf Yazici gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In Dijon-Prenois Lille drive forward through Yusuf Yazici. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 9, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Jonathan David for Lille drives towards goal at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
In the minute 13, Free kick Lille.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yusuf Yazici for Lille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, Dijon have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Dijon.
Lille take a 0-1 lead thanks to Yusuf Yazici.
In the minute 19, Great play from Zeki Celik to set up the goal.
Free kick Lille.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Lille throw-in in Dijon's half.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Dijon.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
In the minute 26, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 31, Jonathan Ikone of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Lille in the half of Dijon.
Dijon's Bersant Celina breaks free at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Lille at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 35, In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille's Jonathan Bamba misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 38, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Dijon a goal kick.
Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dijon's half?
Lille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 42, Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Lille are coming forward and Xeka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Lille.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Dijon.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Lille in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Dijon close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Lille.
Lille are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 47, Lille to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pape Diop.
In the minute 50, Lille have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Pape Diop has recovered and rejoins the match in Dijon-Prenois.
Goal kick for Lille at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 51, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Dijon throw-in in Lille's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon-Prenois.
Jonathan Ikone for the away team is judged to be offside.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lille close to the penalty box.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Burak Yilmaz is replacing Jonathan David for the away team.
In the minute 59, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Dijon.
The home team have replaced Frederic Sammaritano with Eric Ebimbe. This is the first substitution made today by David Linares.
In the minute 62, Jordan Marie (Dijon) has replaced the possibly injured Pape Diop at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Dijon.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Lille in the half of Dijon.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Lille.
Free kick Dijon.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Lille at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Throw-in Lille.
In the minute 69, Dijon to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tim Weah is on a sub for Jonathan Ikone for Lille.
In the minute 72, Lille make their third substitution with Boubakary Soumare replacing Xeka.
David Linares (Dijon) is making a third substitution, with Mihai Dobre replacing Moussa Konate.
The home team replace Chafik with Sacha Boey.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Lille.
In Dijon-Prenois, Lille push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Lille throw-in in Dijon's half.
Free kick in a good position for Lille!
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Dijon.
In Dijon-Prenois Dijon attack through Ngonda Muzinga. The finish is off target, however.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dijon are pushing forward but Ngonda Muzinga's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 81, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Lille a goal kick.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Goal kick for Lille at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 83, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
The away team replace Yusuf Yazici with Isaac Lihadji.
Tiago Djalo is replacing Zeki Celik for Lille at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 85, Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Dijon.
Dijon's Bersant Celina gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Lille have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Dijon in Dijon-Prenois.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Dijon-Prenois.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Dijon.
Dijon needs to be cautious. Lille have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Dijon.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Lille take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Tim Weah.
